proposal: Diving into the world of $BACON, where memes meet serious investment, we see you're sizzling up the crypto space with your unique Buy/Burn 'Utility' for $PORK. With 300 holders on the ETH network, you're not just flipping bacon; you're cooking up a community feast. How about we bring our DEX and Lottery tools to the table? Let's make it easier for anyone in your community to deploy and share in the revenue, turning those 2% taxes into a full-blown banquet. 🥓➡️💼
